entry.title: OES_standard_derivatives : revision 2
entry.summary: Added genType argument and return type to function declarations.

entry.title: OES_vertex_array_object : revision 4
entry.summary:
Renamed "Name Strings" section to "Alias Name Strings".
Sorted Revision History in ascending order.

entry.title: WEBGL_lose_context : revision 6
entry.summary: Renamed "Name Strings" section to "Alias Name Strings".

entry.title: WEBGL_debug_renderer_info : revision 4
entry.summary: Fixed mistake where extension still indicated draft status.

entry.summary:
Fixed mistake where extension still indicated draft status.
Renamed "New Functions and Methods" section to "New Functions".

entry.title: OES_vertex_array_object : revision 3
entry.summary: Added vendor-specific name strings for draft extension per discussion on WebGL mailing list.

entry.title: WEBGL_lose_context : revision 5
entry.summary:
Added vendor-specific name strings for draft extension per discussion on WebGL mailing list
Renamed from WEBGL_EXT_lose_context to WEBGL_lose_context

entry.title: WEBGL_lose_context : revision 4
entry.summary: Changed to make it clear this extension should follow the WebGL spec for the steps involved in handling losing and restoring the context rather than just fire events.
